00047 BLI_INLINE float area2(const float* a, const float* b, const float* c)
00048 {
00049     return (b[0] - a[0]) * (c[2] - a[2]) - (c[0] - a[0]) * (b[2] - a[2]);
00050 }
00051 
00052 BLI_INLINE int left(const float* a, const float* b, const float* c)
00053 {
00054     return area2(a, b, c) < 0;
00055 }
00056 
00057 int polyNumVerts(const unsigned short* p, const int vertsPerPoly)
00058 {
00059     int i, nv = 0;
00060     for (i=0; i<vertsPerPoly; i++)
00061     {
00062         if (p[i]==0xffff)
00063             break;
00064         nv++;
00065     }
00066     return nv;
00067 }
00068 
00069 int polyIsConvex(const unsigned short* p, const int vertsPerPoly, const float* verts)
00070 {
00071     int j, nv = polyNumVerts(p, vertsPerPoly);
00072     if (nv<3)
00073         return 0;
00074     for (j=0; j<nv; j++)
00075     {
00076         const float* v = &verts[3*p[j]];
00077         const float* v_next = &verts[3*p[(j+1)%nv]];
00078         const float* v_prev = &verts[3*p[(nv+j-1)%nv]];
00079         if (!left(v_prev, v, v_next))
00080             return 0;
00081 
00082     }
00083     return 1;
00084 }
00085 
00086 float distPointToSegmentSq(const float* point, const float* a, const float* b)
00087 {
00088     float abx[3], dx[3];
00089     float d, t;
00090 
00091     sub_v3_v3v3(abx, b,a);
00092     sub_v3_v3v3(dx, point,a);
00093 
00094     d = abx[0]*abx[0]+abx[2]*abx[2];
00095     t = abx[0]*dx[0]+abx[2]*dx[2];
00096 
00097     if (d > 0)
00098         t /= d;
00099     if (t < 0)
00100         t = 0;
00101     else if (t > 1)
00102         t = 1;
00103     dx[0] = a[0] + t*abx[0] - point[0];
00104     dx[2] = a[2] + t*abx[2] - point[2];
00105 
00106     return dx[0]*dx[0] + dx[2]*dx[2];
00107 }
00108 
00109 int buildRawVertIndicesData(DerivedMesh* dm, int *nverts_r, float **verts_r, 
00110                                     int *ntris_r, unsigned short **tris_r, int **trisToFacesMap_r,
00111                                     int **recastData)
00112 {
00113     int vi, fi, triIdx;
00114     int nverts, ntris;
00115     int *trisToFacesMap;
00116     float *verts;
00117     unsigned short *tris, *tri;
00118     int nfaces;
00119     MFace *faces;
00120 
00121     nverts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00122     if (nverts>=0xffff)
00123     {
00124         printf("Converting navmesh: Error! Too many vertices. Max number of vertices %d\n", 0xffff);
00125         return 0;
00126     }
00127     verts = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*3*nverts, "buildRawVertIndicesData verts");
00128     dm->getVertCos(dm, (float(*)[3])verts);
00129 
00130     //flip coordinates
00131     for (vi=0; vi<nverts; vi++)
00132     {
00133         SWAP(float, verts[3*vi+1], verts[3*vi+2]);
00134     }
00135 
00136     //calculate number of tris
00137     nfaces = dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00138     faces = dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00139     ntris = nfaces;
00140     for (fi=0; fi<nfaces; fi++)
00141     {
00142         MFace* face = &faces[fi];
00143         if (face->v4)
00144             ntris++;
00145     }
00146 
00147     //copy and transform to triangles (reorder on the run)
00148     trisToFacesMap = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*ntris, "buildRawVertIndicesData trisToFacesMap");
00149     tris = MEM_callocN(sizeof(unsigned short)*3*ntris, "buildRawVertIndicesData tris");
00150     tri = tris;
00151     triIdx = 0;
00152     for (fi=0; fi<nfaces; fi++)
00153     {
00154         MFace* face = &faces[fi];
00155         tri[3*triIdx+0] = (unsigned short) face->v1;
00156         tri[3*triIdx+1] = (unsigned short) face->v3;
00157         tri[3*triIdx+2] = (unsigned short) face->v2;
00158         trisToFacesMap[triIdx++]=fi;
00159         if (face->v4)
00160         {
00161             tri[3*triIdx+0] = (unsigned short) face->v1;
00162             tri[3*triIdx+1] = (unsigned short) face->v4;
00163             tri[3*triIdx+2] = (unsigned short) face->v3;
00164             trisToFacesMap[triIdx++]=fi;
00165         }
00166     }
00167 
00168     //carefully, recast data is just reference to data in derived mesh
00169     *recastData = (int*)CustomData_get_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_RECAST);
00170 
00171     *nverts_r = nverts;
00172     *verts_r = verts;
00173     *ntris_r = ntris;
00174     *tris_r = tris;
00175     *trisToFacesMap_r = trisToFacesMap;
00176 
00177     return 1;
00178 }
00179 
00180 int buildPolygonsByDetailedMeshes(const int vertsPerPoly, const int npolys, 
00181                                           unsigned short* polys, const unsigned short* dmeshes, 
00182                                           const float* verts, const unsigned short* dtris, 
00183                                           const int* dtrisToPolysMap)
00184 {
00185     int polyidx;
00186     int capacity = vertsPerPoly;
00187     unsigned short* newPoly = MEM_callocN(sizeof(unsigned short)*capacity, "buildPolygonsByDetailedMeshes newPoly");
00188     memset(newPoly, 0xff, sizeof(unsigned short)*capacity);
00189 
00190     for (polyidx=0; polyidx<npolys; polyidx++)
00191     {
00192         size_t i;
00193         int j, k;
00194         int nv = 0;
00195         //search border 
00196         int tri, btri = -1;
00197         int edge, bedge = -1;
00198         int dtrisNum = dmeshes[polyidx*4+3];
00199         int dtrisBase = dmeshes[polyidx*4+2];
00200         unsigned char *traversedTris = MEM_callocN(sizeof(unsigned char)*dtrisNum, "buildPolygonsByDetailedMeshes traversedTris");
00201         unsigned short* adjustedPoly;
00202         int adjustedNv;
00203         int allBorderTraversed;
00204 
00205         for (j=0; j<dtrisNum && btri==-1;j++)
00206         {
00207             int curpolytri = dtrisBase+j;
00208             for (k=0; k<3; k++)
00209             {
00210                 unsigned short neighbortri = dtris[curpolytri*3*2+3+k];
00211                 if ( neighbortri==0xffff || dtrisToPolysMap[neighbortri]!=polyidx+1)
00212                 {
00213                     btri = curpolytri;
00214                     bedge = k;
00215                     break;
00216                 }
00217             }                           
00218         }
00219         if (btri==-1 || bedge==-1)
00220         {
00221             //can't find triangle with border edge
00222             MEM_freeN(traversedTris);
00223             MEM_freeN(newPoly);
00224 
00225             return 0;
00226         }
00227 
00228         newPoly[nv++] = dtris[btri*3*2+bedge];
00229         tri = btri;
00230         edge = (bedge+1)%3;
00231         traversedTris[tri-dtrisBase] = 1;
00232         while (tri!=btri || edge!=bedge)
00233         {
00234             int neighbortri = dtris[tri*3*2+3+edge];
00235             if (neighbortri==0xffff || dtrisToPolysMap[neighbortri]!=polyidx+1)
00236             {
00237                 if (nv==capacity)
00238                 {
00239                     unsigned short* newPolyBig;
00240                     capacity += vertsPerPoly;
00241                     newPolyBig = MEM_callocN(sizeof(unsigned short)*capacity, "buildPolygonsByDetailedMeshes newPolyBig");
00242                     memset(newPolyBig, 0xff, sizeof(unsigned short)*capacity);
00243                     memcpy(newPolyBig, newPoly, sizeof(unsigned short)*nv);
00244                     MEM_freeN(newPoly);
00245                     newPoly = newPolyBig;           
00246                 }
00247                 newPoly[nv++] = dtris[tri*3*2+edge];
00248                 //move to next edge                 
00249                 edge = (edge+1)%3;
00250             }
00251             else {
00252                 //move to next tri
00253                 int twinedge = -1;
00254                 for (k=0; k<3; k++)
00255                 {
00256                     if (dtris[neighbortri*3*2+3+k] == tri)
00257                     {
00258                         twinedge = k;
00259                         break;
00260                     }
00261                 }
00262                 if (twinedge==-1)
00263                 {
00264                     printf("Converting navmesh: Error! Can't find neighbor edge - invalid adjacency info\n");
00265                     MEM_freeN(traversedTris);
00266                     goto returnLabel;
00267                 }
00268                 tri = neighbortri;
00269                 edge = (twinedge+1)%3;
00270                 traversedTris[tri-dtrisBase] = 1;
00271             }
00272         }
00273 
00274         adjustedPoly = MEM_callocN(sizeof(unsigned short)*nv, "buildPolygonsByDetailedMeshes adjustedPoly");
00275         adjustedNv = 0;
00276         for (i=0; i<nv; i++)
00277         {
00278             unsigned short prev = newPoly[(nv+i-1)%nv];
00279             unsigned short cur = newPoly[i];
00280             unsigned short next = newPoly[(i+1)%nv];
00281             float distSq = distPointToSegmentSq(&verts[3*cur], &verts[3*prev], &verts[3*next]);
00282             static const float tolerance = 0.001f;
00283             if (distSq>tolerance)
00284                 adjustedPoly[adjustedNv++] = cur;
00285         }
00286         memcpy(newPoly, adjustedPoly, adjustedNv*sizeof(unsigned short));
00287         MEM_freeN(adjustedPoly);
00288         nv = adjustedNv;
00289 
00290         allBorderTraversed = 1;
00291         for (i=0; i<dtrisNum; i++)
00292         {
00293             if (traversedTris[i]==0)
00294             {
00295                 //check whether it has border edges
00296                 int curpolytri = dtrisBase+i;
00297                 for (k=0; k<3; k++)
00298                 {
00299                     unsigned short neighbortri = dtris[curpolytri*3*2+3+k];
00300                     if ( neighbortri==0xffff || dtrisToPolysMap[neighbortri]!=polyidx+1)
00301                     {
00302                         allBorderTraversed = 0;
00303                         break;
00304                     }
00305                 }
00306             }               
00307         }
00308 
00309         if (nv<=vertsPerPoly && allBorderTraversed)
00310         {
00311             for (i=0; i<nv; i++)
00312             {
00313                 polys[polyidx*vertsPerPoly*2+i] = newPoly[i];
00314             }
00315         }
00316 
00317         MEM_freeN(traversedTris);
00318     }
00319 
00320 returnLabel:
00321     MEM_freeN(newPoly);
00322 
00323     return 1;
00324 }
00325 
00326 struct SortContext
00327 {
00328     const int* recastData;
00329     const int* trisToFacesMap;
00330 };
00331 
00332 static int compareByData(void *ctx, const void * a, const void * b)
00333 {
00334     return (((struct SortContext *)ctx)->recastData[((struct SortContext *)ctx)->trisToFacesMap[*(int*)a]] -
00335             ((struct SortContext *)ctx)->recastData[((struct SortContext *)ctx)->trisToFacesMap[*(int*)b]] );
00336 }
00337 
00338 int buildNavMeshData(const int nverts, const float* verts, 
00339                              const int ntris, const unsigned short *tris, 
00340                              const int* recastData, const int* trisToFacesMap,
00341                              int *ndtris_r, unsigned short **dtris_r,
00342                              int *npolys_r, unsigned short **dmeshes_r, unsigned short **polys_r,
00343                              int *vertsPerPoly_r, int **dtrisToPolysMap_r, int **dtrisToTrisMap_r)
00344 
00345 {
00346     int *trisMapping;
00347     int i;
00348     struct SortContext context;
00349     int validTriStart, prevPolyIdx, curPolyIdx, newPolyIdx, prevpolyidx;
00350     unsigned short *dmesh;
00351 
00352     int ndtris, npolys, vertsPerPoly;
00353     unsigned short *dtris, *dmeshes, *polys;
00354     int *dtrisToPolysMap, *dtrisToTrisMap;
00355 
00356     if (!recastData)
00357     {
00358         printf("Converting navmesh: Error! Can't find recast custom data\n");
00359         return 0;
00360     }
00361 
00362     trisMapping = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*ntris, "buildNavMeshData trisMapping");
00363 
00364     //sort the triangles by polygon idx
00365     for (i=0; i<ntris; i++)
00366         trisMapping[i]=i;
00367     context.recastData = recastData;
00368     context.trisToFacesMap = trisToFacesMap;
00369     recast_qsort(trisMapping, ntris, sizeof(int), &context, compareByData);
00370 
00371     //search first valid triangle - triangle of convex polygon
00372     validTriStart = -1;
00373     for (i=0; i< ntris; i++)
00374     {
00375         if (recastData[trisToFacesMap[trisMapping[i]]]>0)
00376         {
00377             validTriStart = i;
00378             break;
00379         }
00380     }
00381 
00382     if (validTriStart<0)
00383     {
00384         printf("Converting navmesh: Error! No valid polygons in mesh\n");
00385         MEM_freeN(trisMapping);
00386         return 0;
00387     }
00388 
00389     ndtris = ntris-validTriStart;
00390     //fill dtris to faces mapping
00391     dtrisToTrisMap = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*ndtris, "buildNavMeshData dtrisToTrisMap");
00392     memcpy(dtrisToTrisMap, &trisMapping[validTriStart], ndtris*sizeof(int));
00393     MEM_freeN(trisMapping);
00394 
00395     //create detailed mesh triangles  - copy only valid triangles
00396     //and reserve memory for adjacency info
00397     dtris = MEM_callocN(sizeof(unsigned short)*3*2*ndtris, "buildNavMeshData dtris");
00398     memset(dtris, 0xffff, sizeof(unsigned short)*3*2*ndtris);
00399     for (i=0; i<ndtris; i++)
00400     {
00401         memcpy(dtris+3*2*i, tris+3*dtrisToTrisMap[i], sizeof(unsigned short)*3);
00402     }
00403 
00404     //create new recast data corresponded to dtris and renumber for continuous indices
00405     prevPolyIdx = -1;
00406     newPolyIdx = 0;
00407     dtrisToPolysMap = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*ndtris, "buildNavMeshData dtrisToPolysMap");
00408     for (i=0; i<ndtris; i++)
00409     {
00410         curPolyIdx = recastData[trisToFacesMap[dtrisToTrisMap[i]]];
00411         if (curPolyIdx!=prevPolyIdx)
00412         {
00413             newPolyIdx++;
00414             prevPolyIdx=curPolyIdx;
00415         }
00416         dtrisToPolysMap[i] = newPolyIdx;
00417     }
00418 
00419 
00420     //build adjacency info for detailed mesh triangles
00421     recast_buildMeshAdjacency(dtris, ndtris, nverts, 3);
00422 
00423     //create detailed mesh description for each navigation polygon
00424     npolys = dtrisToPolysMap[ndtris-1];
00425     dmeshes = MEM_callocN(sizeof(unsigned short)*npolys*4, "buildNavMeshData dmeshes");
00426     memset(dmeshes, 0, npolys*4*sizeof(unsigned short));
00427     dmesh = NULL;
00428     prevpolyidx = 0;
00429     for (i=0; i<ndtris; i++)
00430     {
00431         int curpolyidx = dtrisToPolysMap[i];
00432         if (curpolyidx!=prevpolyidx)
00433         {
00434             if (curpolyidx!=prevpolyidx+1)
00435             {
00436                 printf("Converting navmesh: Error! Wrong order of detailed mesh faces\n");
00437                 return 0;
00438             }
00439             dmesh = dmesh==NULL ? dmeshes : dmesh+4;
00440             dmesh[2] = (unsigned short)i;   //tbase
00441             dmesh[3] = 0;   //tnum
00442             prevpolyidx = curpolyidx;
00443         }
00444         dmesh[3]++;
00445     }
00446 
00447     //create navigation polygons
00448     vertsPerPoly = 6;
00449     polys = MEM_callocN(sizeof(unsigned short)*npolys*vertsPerPoly*2, "buildNavMeshData polys");
00450     memset(polys, 0xff, sizeof(unsigned short)*vertsPerPoly*2*npolys);
00451 
00452     buildPolygonsByDetailedMeshes(vertsPerPoly, npolys, polys, dmeshes, verts, dtris, dtrisToPolysMap);
00453 
00454     *ndtris_r = ndtris;
00455     *npolys_r = npolys;
00456     *vertsPerPoly_r = vertsPerPoly;
00457     *dtris_r = dtris;
00458     *dmeshes_r = dmeshes;
00459     *polys_r = polys;
00460     *dtrisToPolysMap_r = dtrisToPolysMap;
00461     *dtrisToTrisMap_r = dtrisToTrisMap;
00462 
00463     return 1;
00464 }
00465 
00466 
00467 int buildNavMeshDataByDerivedMesh(DerivedMesh *dm, int *vertsPerPoly, 
00468                                           int *nverts, float **verts,
00469                                           int *ndtris, unsigned short **dtris,
00470                                           int *npolys, unsigned short **dmeshes,
00471                                           unsigned short **polys, int **dtrisToPolysMap,
00472                                           int **dtrisToTrisMap, int **trisToFacesMap)
00473 {
00474     int res = 1;
00475     int ntris = 0, *recastData=NULL;
00476     unsigned short *tris=NULL;
00477 
00478     res = buildRawVertIndicesData(dm, nverts, verts, &ntris, &tris, trisToFacesMap, &recastData);
00479     if (!res)
00480     {
00481         printf("Converting navmesh: Error! Can't get vertices and indices from mesh\n");
00482         goto exit;
00483     }
00484 
00485     res = buildNavMeshData(*nverts, *verts, ntris, tris, recastData, *trisToFacesMap,
00486         ndtris, dtris, npolys, dmeshes,polys, vertsPerPoly, 
00487         dtrisToPolysMap, dtrisToTrisMap);
00488     if (!res)
00489     {
00490         printf("Converting navmesh: Error! Can't get vertices and indices from mesh\n");
00491         goto exit;
00492     }
00493 
00494 exit:
00495     if (tris)
00496         MEM_freeN(tris);
00497 
00498     return res;
00499 }
00500 
00501 int polyFindVertex(const unsigned short* p, const int vertsPerPoly, unsigned short vertexIdx)
00502 {
00503     int i, res = -1;
00504     for (i=0; i<vertsPerPoly; i++)
00505     {
00506         if (p[i]==0xffff)
00507             break;
00508         if (p[i]==vertexIdx)
00509         {
00510             res = i;
00511             break;
00512         }
00513     }
00514     return res;
00515 }
